Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products B•R•A•H•M•S PCT Reagent Pack and Calibrators
Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS B•R•A•H•M•S PCT immunometric assay measuring procalcitonin on VITROS 3600 for risk assessment in sepsis and infection management.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of procalcitonin in serum and plasma on VITROS 3600 system to aid in sepsis risk assessment, 28-day mortality prediction, and antibiotic therapy decision-making in critically ill patients.
